belch.name: Belch

comeuppance.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

confide.name: Confide
confide.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
confide.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

confuseray.name: Confuse Ray
confuseray.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
constrict.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

continentalcrush.name: Continental Crush
continentalcrush.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
continentalcrush.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.
conversion.shortDesc: Changes user's type to match its first move.

conversion2.name: Conversion 2
conversion2.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
conversion2.shortDesc: Changes user's type to resist target's last move.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Dynamax Cannon, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
copycat.shortDesc: Uses the last move used in the battle.

coreenforcer.name: Core Enforcer
coreenforcer.desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this effect does not happen, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
coreenforcer.shortDesc: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the foe(s) move first.

corkscrewcrash.name: Corkscrew Crash
corkscrewcrash.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
corkscrewcrash.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

corrosivegas.name: Corrosive Gas
corrosivegas.desc: The target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

cosmicpower.name: Cosmic Power
cosmicpower.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
cosmicpower.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

cottonguard.name: Cotton Guard
cottonguard.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.

cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore
cottonspore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
counter.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

courtchange.name: Court Change
courtchange.desc: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
courtchange.shortDesc: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

covet.name: Covet
covet.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
covet.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

craftyshield.name: Crafty Shield
craftyshield.desc: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
craftyshield.shortDesc: Protects allies from Status moves this turn.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

crosspoison.name: Cross Poison
crosspoison.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
crosspoison.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crunch.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

crushclaw.name: Crush Claw
crushclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

crushgrip.name: Crush Grip
crushgrip.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
crushgrip.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

curse.name: Curse
curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
curse.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

darkestlariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkestlariat.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
darkestlariat.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
darkpulse.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

darkvoid.name: Dark Void
darkvoid.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Darkrai.
darkvoid.shortDesc: Darkrai: Causes the foe(s) to fall asleep.

dazzlinggleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzlinggleam.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

decorate.name: Decorate
decorate.desc: Raises the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
decorate.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 2.

defendorder.name: Defend Order
defendorder.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
defendorder.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

defensecurl.name: Defense Curl
defensecurl.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

defog.name: Defog
defog.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
defog.shortDesc: -1 evasion; clears terrain and hazards on both sides.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
destinybond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

detect.name: Detect
detect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
detect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

devastatingdrake.name: Devastating Drake
devastatingdrake.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
devastatingdrake.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

diamondstorm.name: Diamond Storm
diamondstorm.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.
diamondstorm.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise user's Defense by 2.

dig.name: Dig
dig.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

disable.name: Disable
disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
disable.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

disarmingvoice.name: Disarming Voice
disarmingvoice.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
disarmingvoice.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

direclaw.name: Dire Claw
direclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
direclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

dive.name: Dive
dive.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzypunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

doodle.name: Doodle
doodle.desc: The user and its ally's Abilities change to match the target's Ability. Does not change Ability if the user's or its ally's is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target. Fails if both the user and its ally's Ability already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
doodle.shortDesc: User and ally's Abilities become target's Ability.

doomdesire.name: Doom Desire
doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
doomdesire.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

doubleedge.name: Double-Edge
doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

doublehit.name: Double Hit
doublehit.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

doubleironbash.name: Double Iron Bash
doubleironbash.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
doubleironbash.shortDesc: Hits twice. 30% chance to make the target flinch.

doublekick.name: Double Kick
doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

doubleshock.name: Double Shock
doubleshock.desc: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
doubleshock.shortDesc: User's Electric type: typeless; must be Electric.

doubleslap.name: Double Slap
doubleslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

doubleteam.name: Double Team
doubleteam.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.

dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
dracometeor.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragonascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
dragonascent.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dragondance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

dragondarts.name: Dragon Darts
dragondarts.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. In Double Battles, this move attempts to hit the targeted Pokemon and its ally once each. If hitting one of these Pokemon would be prevented by immunity, protection, semi-invulnerability, an Ability, or accuracy, it attempts to hit the other Pokemon twice instead. If this move is redirected, it hits that target twice.
dragondarts.shortDesc: Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

dragonenergy.name: Dragon Energy
dragonenergy.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
dragonenergy.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

dragonrage.name: Dragon Rage
dragonrage.desc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.
dragonrage.shortDesc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

dragonrush.name: Dragon Rush
dragonrush.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
dragonrush.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

dragontail.name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
dragontail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainingkiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
dreameater.shortDesc: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

drillrun.name: Drill Run
drillrun.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

drumbeating.name: Drum Beating
drumbeating.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
drumbeating.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

dualchop.name: Dual Chop
dualchop.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

dualwingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
dualwingbeat.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

earthpower.name: Earth Power
earthpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
earthpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice
echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
echoedvoice.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
eerieimpulse.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.

eeriespell.name: Eerie Spell
eeriespell.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the target loses 3 PP from its last move.
eeriespell.shortDesc: Removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain
electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Grounded Pokemon cannot become affected by Yawn or fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
electrify.shortDesc: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

electroball.name: Electro Ball
electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40.
electroball.shortDesc: More power the faster the user is than the target.

electrodrift.name: Electro Drift
electrodrift.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
electroweb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
embargo.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.

ember.name: Ember
ember.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
encore.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

endure.name: Endure
endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
endure.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

energyball.name: Energy Ball
energyball.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
energyball.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Truant, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
entrainment.shortDesc: The target's Ability changes to match the user's.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

esperwing.name: Esper Wing
esperwing.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
esperwing.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise user Speed by 1. High crit.

eternabeam.name: Eternabeam
eternabeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

expandingforce.name: Expanding Force
expandingforce.desc: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
expandingforce.shortDesc: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

extremeevoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost
extremeevoboost.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
extremeevoboost.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

facade.name: Facade
facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

fairylock.name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.
fairylock.shortDesc: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

faketears.name: Fake Tears
faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

falsesurrender.name: False Surrender
falsesurrender.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
falsesurrender.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

featherdance.name: Feather Dance
featherdance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

feint.name: Feint
feint.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
feint.shortDesc: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

feintattack.name: Feint Attack
feintattack.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
feintattack.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

fellstinger.name: Fell Stinger
fellstinger.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
fellstinger.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.

fierydance.name: Fiery Dance
fierydance.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
fierydance.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

fierywrath.name: Fiery Wrath
fierywrath.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
fierywrath.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

filletaway.name: Fillet Away
filletaway.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
filletaway.shortDesc: +2 Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed for 1/2 user's max HP.

finalgambit.name: Final Gambit
finalgambit.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
finalgambit.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

fireblast.name: Fire Blast
fireblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
firefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

firelash.name: Fire Lash
firelash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
firelash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

firepledge.name: Fire Pledge
firepledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
firepledge.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

firepunch.name: Fire Punch
firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

firespin.name: Fire Spin
firespin.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
firespin.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

firstimpression.name: First Impression
firstimpression.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
firstimpression.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only.

fishiousrend.name: Fishious Rend
fishiousrend.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
fishiousrend.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
fissure.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

flail.name: Flail
flail.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

flameburst.name: Flame Burst
flameburst.desc: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.
flameburst.shortDesc: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

flamecharge.name: Flame Charge
flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
flamecharge.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
flareblitz.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

flash.name: Flash
flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashcannon.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
flashcannon.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleurcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
fleurcannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

fling.name: Fling
fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
fling.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

flipturn.name: Flip Turn
flipturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
flipturn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

floralhealing.name: Floral Healing
floralhealing.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
floralhealing.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

flowershield.name: Flower Shield
flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
flowershield.shortDesc: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

flowertrick.name: Flower Trick
flowertrick.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
flowertrick.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

fly.name: Fly
fly.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
fly.shortDesc: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

flyingpress.name: Flying Press
flyingpress.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
flyingpress.shortDesc: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

focusenergy.name: Focus Energy
focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

focuspunch.name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

followme.name: Follow Me
followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
followme.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

forcepalm.name: Force Palm
forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

forestscurse.name: Forest's Curse
forestscurse.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
forestscurse.shortDesc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

foulplay.name: Foul Play
foulplay.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
foulplay.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry
freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
freezedry.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

freezeshock.name: Freeze Shock
freezeshock.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

freezingglare.name: Freezing Glare
freezingglare.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

frostbreath.name: Frost Breath
frostbreath.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
frostbreath.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

furyattack.name: Fury Attack
furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

furycutter.name: Fury Cutter
furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes
furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.

fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.

geargrind.name: Gear Grind
geargrind.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

gearup.name: Gear Up
gearup.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
gearup.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

genesissupernova.name: Genesis Supernova
genesissupernova.desc: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact
gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

gigatonhammer.name: Gigaton Hammer
gigatonhammer.desc: Cannot be used twice in a row.
gigatonhammer.shortDesc: Cannot be used twice in a row.

gigavolthavoc.name: Gigavolt Havoc
gigavolthavoc.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
gigavolthavoc.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

glaciallance.name: Glacial Lance
glaciallance.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

glaciate.name: Glaciate
glaciate.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
glaciate.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

glaiverush.name: Glaive Rush
glaiverush.desc: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
glaiverush.shortDesc: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
grasspledge.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle
grasswhistle.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
grasswhistle.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

grassyglide.name: Grassy Glide
grassyglide.desc: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.

grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.

gravapple.name: Grav Apple
gravapple.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Power is multiplied by 1.5 during Gravity's effect.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.

growl.name: Growl
growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

growth.name: Growth
growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
growth.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

guardianofalola.name: Guardian of Alola
guardianofalola.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
guardianofalola.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

guardsplit.name: Guard Split
guardsplit.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
guardsplit.shortDesc: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.

guardswap.name: Guard Swap
guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
guardswap.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot
gunkshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

gust.name: Gust
gust.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
gust.shortDesc: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.

gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
gyroball.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.

hail.name: Hail
hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm
hammerarm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

harden.name: Harden
harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

haze.name: Haze
haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

headcharge.name: Head Charge
headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

headlongrush.name: Headlong Rush
headlongrush.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
headlongrush.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

headsmash.name: Head Smash
headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

healblock.name: Heal Block
healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
healblock.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

healorder.name: Heal Order
healorder.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
healorder.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

heartstamp.name: Heart Stamp
heartstamp.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
heartstamp.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

heartswap.name: Heart Swap
heartswap.desc: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.
heartswap.shortDesc: Swaps all stat changes with target.

heatcrash.name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

heatwave.name: Heat Wave
heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heavyslam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

hex.name: Hex
hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
hex.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick
highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

holdback.name: Hold Back
holdback.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

holdhands.name: Hold Hands
holdhands.desc: No competitive use. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.

honeclaws.name: Hone Claws
honeclaws.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
honeclaws.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.

horndrill.name: Horn Drill
horndrill.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
horndrill.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

hornleech.name: Horn Leech
hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
hornleech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

howl.name: Howl
howl.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
howl.shortDesc: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon
hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

hydrosteam.name: Hydro Steam
hydrosteam.desc: If the current weather is Sunny Day and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella, this move's damage is multiplied by 1.5 instead of halved for being Water type.
hydrosteam.shortDesc: During Sunny Day: 1.5x damage instead of half.

hydrovortex.name: Hydro Vortex
hydrovortex.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
hydrovortex.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam
hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang
hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyperfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.

hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole
hyperspacehole.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacehole.shortDesc: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
hypnosis.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

iceball.name: Ice Ball
iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

icebeam.name: Ice Beam
icebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

iceburn.name: Ice Burn
iceburn.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

icefang.name: Ice Fang
icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
icefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.

icehammer.name: Ice Hammer
icehammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

icepunch.name: Ice Punch
icepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

icespinner.name: Ice Spinner
icespinner.desc: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.

iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash
iciclecrash.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
iciclecrash.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear
iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.desc: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

infernalparade.name: Infernal Parade
infernalparade.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
infernalparade.shortDesc: 30% burn. 2x power if target is already statused.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

infernooverdrive.name: Inferno Overdrive
infernooverdrive.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
infernooverdrive.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
infestation.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
ingrain.shortDesc: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, Wicked Torque, any two-turn move, or any recharge move.
instruct.shortDesc: The target immediately uses its last used move.

iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge
iondeluge.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn. The effect happens after other effects that change a move's type.
iondeluge.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

irondefense.name: Iron Defense
irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

ironhead.name: Iron Head
ironhead.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
ironhead.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

ivycudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
ivycudgel.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. If the user is an Ogerpon holding a mask, this move's type changes to match. Water type for Wellspring Mask, Fire type for Hearthflame Mask, and Rock type for Cornerstone Mask.
ivycudgel.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Type depends on user's form.

jawlock.name: Jaw Lock
jawlock.desc: Prevents the user and the target from switching out. The user and the target can still switch out if either of them is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
jawlock.shortDesc: Prevents both user and target from switching out.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
judgment.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Plate.

jumpkick.name: Jump Kick
jumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
jumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

junglehealing.name: Jungle Healing
junglehealing.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
junglehealing.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

karatechop.name: Karate Chop
karatechop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

kingsshield.name: King's Shield
kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

knockoff.name: Knock Off
knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
knockoff.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

kowtowcleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
kowtowcleave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
kowtowcleave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

landswrath.name: Land's Wrath

laserfocus.name: Laser Focus

lashout.name: Lash Out

lastresort.name: Last Resort

lastresort.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.

lastrespects.name: Last Respects
lastrespects.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side, and X cannot be greater than 100.
lastrespects.shortDesc: +50 power for each time a party member fainted.

leechlife.name: Leech Life

leechlife.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

leechseed.name: Leech Seed

If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Mortal Spin or Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.

leer.name: Leer

lick.name: Lick

lifedew.name: Life Dew

lockon.name: Lock-On

lovelykiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovelykiss.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

lowkick.name: Low Kick

luminacrash.name: Lumina Crash
luminacrash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
luminacrash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

lunarblessing.name: Lunar Blessing
lunarblessing.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
lunarblessing.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

lunardance.name: Lunar Dance
lunardance.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or PP, or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP and PP are fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets any of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.

lunge.name: Lunge

magiccoat.name: Magic Coat

Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

magicpowder.name: Magic Powder
magicpowder.desc: Causes the target to become a Psychic type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Psychic type, or if the target is Terastallized.
magicpowder.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Psychic.

magicroom.name: Magic Room

magicroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

magmastorm.name: Magma Storm

The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. magnetrise.name: Magnet Rise

If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
magnetrise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

makeitrain.name: Make It Rain

maliciousmoonsault.name: Malicious Moonsault

matblock.name: Mat Block

matblock.shortDesc: Protects allies from damaging attacks. Turn 1 only.

matchagotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha

This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.

maxdarkness.name: Max Darkness

Fails if the user moves last this turn.

maxstrike.name: Max Strike
maxstrike.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxstrike.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Speed.

maxwyrmwind.name: Max Wyrmwind
maxwyrmwind.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxwyrmwind.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Attack.

meanlook.name: Mean Look
meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
meanlook.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

mefirst.name: Me First
mefirst.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Beak Blast, Belch, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Magical Torque, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Struggle, Thief, or Wicked Torque. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
mefirst.shortDesc: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

megadrain.name: Mega Drain
megadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
megadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

memento.name: Memento
memento.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
memento.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

metalburst.name: Metal Burst
metalburst.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
metalburst.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
metalclaw.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

metalsound.name: Metal Sound
metalsound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
metalsound.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

meteorassault.name: Meteor Assault
meteorassault.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

meteorbeam.name: Meteor Beam
meteorbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
meteorbeam.shortDesc: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

meteormash.name: Meteor Mash
meteormash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Apple Acid, Armor Cannon, Assist, Astral Barrage, Aura Wheel, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Body Press, Branch Poke, Breaking Swipe, Celebrate, Chatter, Chilling Water, Chilly Reception, Clangorous Soul, Collision Course, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Decorate, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Doodle, Double Iron Bash, Double Shock, Dragon Ascent, Dragon Energy, Drum Beating, Dynamax Cannon, Electro Drift, Endure, Eternabeam, False Surrender, Feint, Fiery Wrath, Fillet Away, Fleur Cannon, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Freezing Glare, Glacial Lance, Grav Apple, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyper Drill, Hyperspace Fury, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, Instruct, Jet Punch, Jungle Healing, King's Shield, Life Dew, Light of Ruin, Magical Torque, Make It Rain, Mat Block, Me First, Meteor Assault, Metronome, Mimic, Mind Blown, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Moongeist Beam, Nature Power, Nature's Madness, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Order Up, Origin Pulse, Overdrive, Photon Geyser, Plasma Fists, Population Bomb, Pounce, Power Shift, Precipice Blades, Protect, Pyro Ball, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Fist, Rage Powder, Raging Bull, Raging Fury, Relic Song, Revival Blessing, Ruination, Salt Cure, Secret Sword, Shed Tail, Shell Trap, Silk Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snap Trap, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Snowscape, Spectral Thief, Spicy Extract, Spiky Shield, Spirit Break, Spotlight, Springtide Storm, Steam Eruption, Steel Beam, Strange Steam, Struggle, Sunsteel Strike, Surging Strikes, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Thunder Cage, Thunderous Kick, Tidy Up, Trailblaze, Transform, Trick, Twin Beam, V-create, Wicked Blow, Wicked Torque, or Wide Guard.

milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.desc: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Assist, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
mimic.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

mindblown.name: Mind Blown
mindblown.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability. This move is prevented from executing and the user does not lose HP if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, or if this move is Fire type and the user is affected by Powder or the weather is Primordial Sea.
mindblown.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
mindreader.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

miracleeye.name: Miracle Eye
