miracleeye.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

mirrormove.name: Mirror Move
mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.
mirrormove.shortDesc: User uses the target's last used move against it.

mirrorshot.name: Mirror Shot
mirrorshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mirrorshot.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mist.name: Mist
mist.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
mist.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

mistball.name: Mist Ball
mistball.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mistball.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

mistyexplosion.name: Misty Explosion
mistyexplosion.desc: If the current terrain is Misty Terrain and the user is grounded, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
mistyexplosion.shortDesc: User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

mistyterrain.name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
mistyterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moonblast.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moongeistbeam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeistbeam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moongeistbeam.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
morningsun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

mortalspin.name: Mortal Spin
mortalspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
mortalspin.shortDesc: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

mountaingale.name: Mountain Gale
mountaingale.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
mountaingale.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

mudbomb.name: Mud Bomb
mudbomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudbomb.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mudshot.name: Mud Shot
mudshot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
mudshot.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudslap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mudsport.name: Mud Sport
mudsport.desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
mudsport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

multiattack.name: Multi-Attack
multiattack.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory.
multiattack.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Memory.

mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire
mysticalfire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalfire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

mysticalpower.name: Mystical Power
mysticalpower.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalpower.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

nastyplot.name: Nasty Plot
nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
nastyplot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

naturalgift.name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
naturalgift.shortDesc: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

naturepower.name: Nature Power
naturepower.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
naturepower.shortDesc: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).

naturesmadness.name: Nature's Madness
naturesmadness.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
naturesmadness.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

needlearm.name: Needle Arm
needlearm.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
needlearm.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

neverendingnightmare.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
neverendingnightmare.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
neverendingnightmare.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

nightdaze.name: Night Daze
nightdaze.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
nightdaze.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

nightshade.name: Night Shade
nightshade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
nightshade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

nightslash.name: Night Slash
nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

nobleroar.name: Noble Roar
nobleroar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
nobleroar.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

noretreat.name: No Retreat
noretreat.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
noretreat.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

oblivionwing.name: Oblivion Wing
oblivionwing.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
oblivionwing.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

obstruct.name: Obstruct
obstruct.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Defense lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
obstruct.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -2 Def.

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
octazooka.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

octolock.name: Octolock
octolock.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. At the end of each turn during effect, the target's Defense and Special Defense are lowered by 1 stage. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
octolock.shortDesc: Traps target, lowers Def and SpD by 1 each turn.

odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ominouswind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

orderup.name: Order Up
orderup.desc: If an ally Tatsugiri has activated its Commander Ability, this move raises the user's Attack by 1 stage if the Tatsugiri is Curly Form, Defense by 1 stage if Droopy Form, or Speed by 1 stage if Stretchy Form. The effect happens whether or not this move is successful, and even if the Tatsugiri that activated the effect has since fainted.

originpulse.name: Origin Pulse
originpulse.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

paraboliccharge.name: Parabolic Charge
paraboliccharge.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
paraboliccharge.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

partingshot.name: Parting Shot
partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

payback.name: Payback
payback.desc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

phantomforce.name: Phantom Force
phantomforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
phantomforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser
photongeyser.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
photongeyser.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

pinmissile.name: Pin Missile
pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists
plasmafists.desc: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

playnice.name: Play Nice
playnice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

playrough.name: Play Rough
playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playrough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

poisonfang.name: Poison Fang
poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

poisonjab.name: Poison Jab
poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

poisonsting.name: Poison Sting
poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

poisontail.name: Poison Tail
poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

pollenpuff.name: Pollen Puff
pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
pollenpuff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.desc: Fails if the target has no held item.
poltergeist.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.

populationbomb.name: Population Bomb
populationbomb.desc: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
populationbomb.shortDesc: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

pounce.name: Pounce
pounce.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
pounce.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

powder.name: Powder
powder.desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
powder.shortDesc: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

powdersnow.name: Powder Snow
powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

powersplit.name: Power Split
powersplit.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
powersplit.shortDesc: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

powerswap.name: Power Swap
powerswap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
powerswap.shortDesc: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

powertrick.name: Power Trick
powertrick.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powertrick.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

powertrip.name: Power Trip
powertrip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
powertrip.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
poweruppunch.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

present.name: Present
present.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

prismaticlaser.name: Prismatic Laser
prismaticlaser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

protect.name: Protect
protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

psyblade.name: Psyblade
psyblade.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5.

psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
psychicfangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

psychicterrain.name: Psychic Terrain
psychicterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.

psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

psychocut.name: Psycho Cut
psychocut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.desc: The user's non-volatile status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no non-volatile status condition or if the target already has one.
psychoshift.shortDesc: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

psyshieldbash.name: Psyshield Bash
psyshieldbash.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
psyshieldbash.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psyshock.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psystrike.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
psywave.shortDesc: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
punishment.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

purify.name: Purify
purify.desc: The target is cured if it has a non-volatile status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
purify.shortDesc: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDesc: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

pyroball.name: Pyro Ball
pyroball.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
pyroball.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

quash.name: Quash
quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
quash.shortDesc: Forces the target to move last this turn.

quickguard.name: Quick Guard
quickguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
quickguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

quiverdance.name: Quiver Dance
quiverdance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
quiverdance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

rage.name: Rage
rage.desc: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
rage.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

ragefist.name: Rage Fist
ragefist.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
ragefist.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
ragepowder.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

ragingbull.name: Raging Bull
ragingbull.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
ragingbull.shortDesc: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

ragingfury.name: Raging Fury
ragingfury.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
ragingfury.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

raindance.name: Rain Dance
raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
rapidspin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
razorleaf.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

razorshell.name: Razor Shell
razorshell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
razorshell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

razorwind.name: Razor Wind
razorwind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
razorwind.shortDesc: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

reflecttype.name: Reflect Type
reflecttype.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the user is Terastallized, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
reflecttype.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
refresh.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

relicsong.name: Relic Song
relicsong.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
relicsong.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

rest.name: Rest
rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance
revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
revelationdance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

revivalblessing.name: Revival Blessing
revivalblessing.desc: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
revivalblessing.shortDesc: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

risingvoltage.name: Rising Voltage
risingvoltage.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain and the target is grounded, this move's power is doubled.
risingvoltage.shortDesc: 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.

roar.name: Roar
roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
roar.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

roaroftime.name: Roar of Time
roaroftime.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

rockblast.name: Rock Blast
rockblast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

rockclimb.name: Rock Climb
rockclimb.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

rockpolish.name: Rock Polish
rockpolish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

rockslide.name: Rock Slide
rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rockslide.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

rocksmash.name: Rock Smash
rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rockwrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

roleplay.name: Role Play
roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
roleplay.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick
rollingkick.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rollingkick.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

roost.name: Roost
roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
rototiller.shortDesc: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

round.name: Round
round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
round.shortDesc: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

ruination.name: Ruination
ruination.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
ruination.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
sacredfire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
sacredsword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

saltcure.name: Salt Cure
saltcure.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
saltcure.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

sandattack.name: Sand Attack
sandattack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

sandsearstorm.name: Sandsear Storm
sandsearstorm.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
sandsearstorm.shortDesc: 20% chance to burn foe(s). Can't miss in rain.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
sandstorm.shortDesc: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
sandtomb.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

savagespinout.name: Savage Spin-Out
savagespinout.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
savagespinout.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

scald.name: Scald
scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scald.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

scaleshot.name: Scale Shot
scaleshot.desc: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
scaleshot.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

scaryface.name: Scary Face
scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

scorchingsands.name: Scorching Sands
scorchingsands.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scorchingsands.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

screech.name: Screech
screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

searingshot.name: Searing Shot
searingshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

searingsunrazesmash.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
searingsunrazesmash.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
searingsunrazesmash.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

secretpower.name: Secret Power
secretpower.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
secretpower.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

secretsword.name: Secret Sword
secretsword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
secretsword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
seedflare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
seismictoss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
selfdestruct.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone
shadowbone.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowbone.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw
shadowclaw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

shadowforce.name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shadowforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch
shadowpunch.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
shadowpunch.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

shatteredpsyche.name: Shattered Psyche
shatteredpsyche.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shatteredpsyche.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

shedtail.name: Shed Tail
shedtail.desc: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
shedtail.shortDesc: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

sheercold.name: Sheer Cold
sheercold.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
sheercold.shortDesc: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

shellsidearm.name: Shell Side Arm
shellsidearm.desc: Has a 20% chance to poison the target. This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
shellsidearm.shortDesc: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

shellsmash.name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
shellsmash.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

shelltrap.name: Shell Trap
shelltrap.desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack from an opponent this turn before it can execute the move. If the user was hit and has not fainted, it attacks immediately after being hit, and the effect ends. If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect.
shelltrap.shortDesc: User must take physical damage before moving.

shelter.name: Shelter
shelter.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

shiftgear.name: Shift Gear
shiftgear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
shiftgear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

shockwave.name: Shock Wave
shockwave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
shockwave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

shoreup.name: Shore Up
shoreup.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shoreup.shortDesc: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

signalbeam.name: Signal Beam
signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

silktrap.name: Silk Trap
silktrap.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Speed lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
silktrap.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Spe.

silverwind.name: Silver Wind
silverwind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
silverwind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

simplebeam.name: Simple Beam
simplebeam.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.

sing.name: Sing
sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sing.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.
sketch.shortDesc: Permanently copies the last move target used.

skillswap.name: Skill Swap
skillswap.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
skillswap.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

skittersmack.name: Skitter Smack
skittersmack.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
skittersmack.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower target's Sp. Atk by 1.

skullbash.name: Skull Bash
skullbash.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skullbash.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

skydrop.name: Sky Drop
skydrop.desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200 kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally, if the target has a substitute, or if the target is using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, or Sky Drop.
skydrop.shortDesc: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
skyuppercut.shortDesc: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

slackoff.name: Slack Off
slackoff.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

slash.name: Slash
slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

sleeppowder.name: Sleep Powder
sleeppowder.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sleeppowder.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

sludgewave.name: Sludge Wave
sludgewave.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

smackdown.name: Smack Down
smackdown.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.

smartstrike.name: Smart Strike
smartstrike.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
smartstrike.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

smellingsalts.name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
smellingsalts.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

smog.name: Smog
smog.desc: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

snaptrap.name: Snap Trap
snaptrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
snaptrap.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
snarl.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.desc: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
snatch.shortDesc: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

snipeshot.name: Snipe Shot
snipeshot.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This move cannot be redirected to a different target by any effect.
snipeshot.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Cannot be redirected.

snore.name: Snore
snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
snore.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

snowscape.name: Snowscape
snowscape.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. During the effect, the Defense of Ice-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a physical attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Snow.
snowscape.shortDesc: For 5 turns, snow falls. Ice: 1.5x Def.

soak.name: Soak
soak.desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Water type, or if the target is Terastallized.
soak.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Water.

softboiled.name: Soft-Boiled
softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarbeam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

solarblade.name: Solar Blade
solarblade.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarblade.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

sonicboom.name: Sonic Boom
sonicboom.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

spacialrend.name: Spacial Rend
spacialrend.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

spark.name: Spark
spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
sparklingaria.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief
spectralthief.desc: The target's stat stages greater than 0 are stolen from it and applied to the user before dealing damage.
spectralthief.shortDesc: Steals target's boosts before dealing damage.

speedswap.name: Speed Swap
speedswap.desc: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected.

spicyextract.name: Spicy Extract
spicyextract.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and lowers its Defense by 2 stages.
spicyextract.shortDesc: Raises target's Atk by 2 and lowers its Def by 2.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiderweb.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon
spikecannon.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

spikyshield.name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
spikyshield.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

spinout.name: Spin Out
spinout.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 2 stages.

spiritbreak.name: Spirit Break
spiritbreak.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
spiritbreak.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spiritshackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiritshackle.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

spitup.name: Spit Up
spitup.desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
spitup.shortDesc: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

spite.name: Spite
spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
spite.shortDesc: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

splinteredstormshards.name: Splintered Stormshards
splinteredstormshards.desc: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.

spore.name: Spore
spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
spore.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

spotlight.name: Spotlight
spotlight.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from opponents of the target are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal.
spotlight.shortDesc: Target's foes' moves are redirected to it this turn.

springtidestorm.name: Springtide Storm
springtidestorm.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
springtidestorm.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) Attack by 1.

stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stealthrock.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

steameruption.name: Steam Eruption
steameruption.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
steameruption.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

steamroller.name: Steamroller
steamroller.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
steamroller.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

steelbeam.name: Steel Beam
steelbeam.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability.

steelroller.name: Steel Roller
steelroller.desc: Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.
steelroller.shortDesc: Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the terrain.

steelwing.name: Steel Wing
steelwing.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stickyweb.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.
stockpile.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

stokedsparksurfer.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
stokedsparksurfer.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
stomp.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
stompingtantrum.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

stoneaxe.name: Stone Axe
stoneaxe.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stoneaxe.shortDesc: Sets Stealth Rock on the target's side.

stoneedge.name: Stone Edge
stoneedge.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
storedpower.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

stormthrow.name: Storm Throw
stormthrow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
stormthrow.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

strangesteam.name: Strange Steam
strangesteam.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
strengthsap.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

stringshot.name: String Shot
stringshot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.shortDesc: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

strugglebug.name: Struggle Bug
strugglebug.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
strugglebug.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

stuffcheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks
stuffcheeks.desc: This move cannot be selected unless the user is holding a Berry. The user eats its Berry and raises its Defense by 2 stages. This effect is not prevented by the Klutz or Unnerve Abilities, or the effects of Embargo or Magic Room. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry.
stuffcheeks.shortDesc: Must hold Berry to use. User eats Berry, Def +2.

submission.name: Submission
submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

subzeroslammer.name: Subzero Slammer
subzeroslammer.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
subzeroslammer.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
suckerpunch.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

sunsteelstrike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteelstrike.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
sunsteelstrike.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

supersonic.name: Supersonic
supersonic.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
supersonic.shortDesc: Causes the target to become confused.

supersonicskystrike.name: Supersonic Skystrike
supersonicskystrike.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
supersonicskystrike.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

surf.name: Surf
surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
surf.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

surgingstrikes.name: Surging Strikes
surgingstrikes.desc: Hits three times. This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
surgingstrikes.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit. Hits 3 times.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
swagger.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
swallow.shortDesc: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweetkiss.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
sweetkiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to become confused.

sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent
sweetscent.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 2 stages.

swift.name: Swift
swift.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
swift.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
switcheroo.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

swordsdance.name: Swords Dance
swordsdance.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.desc: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.
synchronoise.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

syrupbomb.name: Syrup Bomb
syrupbomb.desc: If this move is successful, it causes the target's Speed to be lowered by 1 stage at the end of each turn for 3 turns.
syrupbomb.shortDesc: Target's Speed is lowered by 1 stage for 3 turns.

tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

tailslap.name: Tail Slap
tailslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

tailwhip.name: Tail Whip
tailwhip.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
tailwind.shortDesc: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

takedown.name: Take Down
takedown.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

takeheart.name: Take Heart
takeheart.desc: The user cures its non-volatile status condition. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
takeheart.shortDesc: Cures user's status, raises Sp. Atk, Sp. Def by 1.

tarshot.name: Tar Shot
tarshot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage. Until the target switches out, the effectiveness of Fire-type moves is doubled against it.
tarshot.shortDesc: Target gets -1 Spe and becomes weaker to Fire.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
taunt.shortDesc: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

tearfullook.name: Tearful Look
tearfullook.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
tearfullook.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

teatime.name: Teatime
teatime.desc: All active Pokemon consume their held Berries. This effect is not prevented by substitutes, the Klutz or Unnerve Abilities, or the effects of Embargo or Magic Room. Fails if no active Pokemon is holding a Berry.
teatime.shortDesc: All active Pokemon consume held Berries.

technoblast.name: Techno Blast
technoblast.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.
technoblast.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Drive.

tectonicrage.name: Tectonic Rage
tectonicrage.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
